author: Simon Difford
description: The rich wintery flavours of sloe gin and honey are balanced by lemon juice with clove providing seasonal spice and rosé champagne lifting and refreshing all.
name: Saison l'Hiver
recipeIngredient: 10 ml Honey syrup (3 honey to 1 water)

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE clove in base of shaker
Add next 3 ingredients, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into chilled glass
